name: Cuphead demake for NES
description:
PS: This is a fan made for cuphead, it is property of MDHR studios

Embark  on an adventure with Cuphead, defeating bosses, getting new powers and more!

(The game probably has some bugs, if you see something, talk with me pls <3)

Controls

A and D  - Movement.

K - Interact/ Shoot.

W - Aim.

SPACE - jump.
